text: Joey Harrington (born October 21, 1978) is an American retired football player. He played as a quarterback for the Atlanta Falcons in the NFL. Harrington also played for the Detroit Lions and the Miami Dolphins. Harrington was born in Portland, Oregon. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Portland, Oregon
title: Joey Harrington
